Blog.post: I want to change my fucking template from the puke green one to the cool one with dots but for some reason its still green.....! Under the template thing it says that its the one with dots but when I hit "view blog" it is still green. Somebody help me!!!!

Hi Aaron! I have my own Blog-thingy now!!! Isn't it grand?! Well, I guess thats all I really have to say at the moment. I need to go look at this place. (I really don't know what it is to be honest... Aaron just told me to come here ...) ttyl, luv ya, bye
I have to go shopping tomorrow with my grandma so that I can make a pair of pj pants with her. How fun.

God damn I'm so bored. What the fuck..... My dad wakes me up at 8:30 and I can't go back to sleep. Okay, I am going to type one of my poems and you are going to tell me if it sucks or not. 10 More Minutes 10 more minutes of this life I just can't handle all this strife I need somewhere to rest my head Maybe I should go to bed Swallow pills to say goodnight For once my room is just too bright So many times I sat and cried You'll never know how hard I tried

I feel really bad because yesterday was my brothers birthday and my mom got completely shit faced. Luckily he is only five and he didn't know that his mom was drunk but that hardly makes up for it. Whatever, at least I got him the one thing he really wanted for his birthday, I really lucked out because I didn't know that he wanted it.

I have to go to my moms today which sucks because I am going to be there through Wedsday. (I hate my mom) But whatever, I have to go do laundry because I don't have any clean clothes. Oh, and I am going to valleyfair with the guy I like (who doesn't like be back) and our friend (who told me he doesn't like be back). It should be fun, but it would be even more fun if he liked me back. :(
I asked my friend if his friend, who is also mine, liked me. And he said he didn't think so, so I am kind of kicking myself for asking. I guess I really should have just let myself wonder. Whatever.
Wow, I don't think it's possible for you to find a trashier show. Hehe.

Yeah, its been a couple of days I believe. I didn't really have a whole lot to say I guess. My ex is moving away tomorrow. I went to her house to say goodbye today. I also got my room clean, which is nice seeing as how it was a disaster. whatever, I guess I have nothing to say now either.

I cleaned the kitchen top to bottom, litteraly. (I even washed the walls..... gross!) I am able to bring someone to the Depot with me this friday, so I'm bringing my really hot ex; who wouldn't be my ex if we didn't live so far away, but whatever...........yeah, i have nothing else to say.............

Hello, I am HELLA bored.... I don't even know what to do with myself. I got a really kinky haircut Yesterday though. Thats pretty cool I suppose, for me anyway. Yeah, I really have nothing to say so, see ya!

Its a priday noght and I'm going to spend it with these snotty kids I hate... I HATE babysitting. Well atleast the woman pays well. I suppose she knows her kids are bitches. Anyway, anyone who is reading this must come to the Depot on the 13th because my friends band is playing there. They are a really great punk band, though technically they would be a grunge band if grunge still existed... meh
My Milton came back!!! I hope he takes Jahosafat with him this time... I wonder why he left him last time? Milton and Jahosafat are my ducks for the record.

This guy just IMed me out of no where... a little weird... but whats weirder was I thought that it was my friends Screen Name, but I guess not. Just some dude from Mass. Isn't it weird how things happen like that? You think you understand how things work and than all of a sudden you blink and everything has changed.
Hey.... that seems to be all the inspiration I have to muster at the moment. Ick, I just said 'muster.' Anyway, I'm home alone!!!! Yeah, I dunno.........
Wow, I wake up early to be a good kid and I get slapped with the tasks of mowing and raking the lawn. My two least favorite jobs ever! Damn I need a g/f or b/f...... hehehe

Today I am going to start posting everyday, I don't really know why I am telling you all this. (By 'you all' I mean you Aaron... but maybe you could tell your friends about my site?????!) Anyway I guess its just something to do, but whatever.... to me I see it as someplace I can just clear my head and not have to worry about someone judging me. Anyways enough with the mushy crap. Peace OUT!!!!
I am off to install ceiling fans today with the Dirt Nazi, a.k.a. my dad.
Just when you think you are ok, life slaps you across the face and tells you other wise...
